page.title: 13Chicken's Rd.,Colt's Way or?
page.content: The inhabitants of our village object to the English translation of Heol-y- Cyw so efforts are being made to trace the origin of the name. The village developed due to coal mining during the last 90 years. Early 19th. century Ordinance survey records do not mention the village. Some authorities suggest that{Cyw}is a corruption of either{Ciwc or Cue} though there is no written evidence to support this. However, records of the early 17th. century refer to land south of the present village,as{Gwaun-y-Kiw - the {Meadow of the Kiw.}It seems likely that this land was a grazing area for young horses rather than young chickens. (See glossary.) One day, maybe, our village will be known as{Heol-y-Cyw (Colt's Way.) (Group A.) L.A.
